easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I’m long and pointy, and I like to wag when I’m happy. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of something that flies with a string.

medium.q: I’m a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: The word changes when you add two letters.

hard.q: Two siblings start at the same point. One moves only north or east; the other moves only south or west. After four moves each, who is closer to the origin? Explain briefly.
hard.a: The one who makes opposite moves; they end up equidistant or the one with the net displacement depending on path. Hint: track coordinates.
hard.hint: Plot each move as a coordinate change and compare distances.
